title: x-oca-detector
description: Detector objects define tools, software, products, etc. that are capable of performing detection. They should likely be related to one or more Detection obects.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `x-oca-detector`.

name.description: The name used to identify the Detector.

valid_until.description: The time at which this Detector should no longer be considered valuable intelligence.

vendor.description: The vendor name of the Detector.

vendor_url.description: A URL that links to the vendor of the Detector's primary website.

product.description: The product name of the Detector.

product_url.description: A URL that links to an official download of the Detector product or a primary website describing the Detector product.

detection_types.description: A list of the types of detections the detector can perform. For example: beacon, phishing, exfiltration.

detector_data_categories.description: A list of the general categories of data the detector uses. For example: network, endpoint, etc.

detector_data_sources.description: A list of the specific data sources the detector uses. For example: pcap, windows security event logs, sysmon, etc.
